hero.title: Capturing Life's Beautiful Moments

about.bio:
I'm Jane dela Cruz, a professional photographer with over 10 years of experience capturing special moments and creating visual stories. My passion lies in finding the perfect light and composition to create images that evoke emotion and tell a story.

After studying Fine Arts at the University of Washington, I began my career as a photojournalist before transitioning to commercial and portrait photography. My work has been featured in several publications and exhibitions.

When I'm not behind the camera, you can find me hiking in the mountains or teaching photography workshops to aspiring photographers.

testimonials.text: Jane captured our wedding day perfectly. Her ability to find the right moments and compose beautiful shots is incredible. We'll cherish these photos forever.
testimonials.author: Sarah & Michael Johnson

testimonials.text: Working with Jane on our product campaign was a pleasure. She understood our brand aesthetic immediately and delivered stunning images that boosted our sales.
testimonials.author: David Chen, Luxe Watches

testimonials.text: The family portraits Jane took for us are absolutely beautiful. She made us all feel comfortable and captured our family's personality perfectly.
testimonials.author: The Williams Family
